name: Modulus:Phase One
description:
Modulus Phase One is a WIP of some five years that grew in scope along the way!

'Modulus is a space 4x RTS

-Player designed units.

-Dynamic destruction.

-Advanced offensive/defensive logic systems and behavioral controls.

-Emergent, swarm based enemy AI.

-Explosions, lots and lots of lovely explosions....

-Interface for Touchscreen, KBM, and gamepad.

Game is not yet complete!

This is Early - Early Access Release!

Price will eventually be much higher.....
